column4: Hi anyone, Every time I want to share both PC using the same Ubuntu Jaunty, and I got error unable to mount drive, is there any help?
I searched in Ubuntuforums.org but i don't get my self helped
I am being ignored, Every time I want to share both PC using the same Ubuntu Jaunty, and I got error unable to mount drive, is there any help?
i have shared both computer but when I click share folder in my network, it always unable to mount drive or something like that
it might be a permissions thing
then the location of the mount point
if the mountpoint is /media/D try the terminal command "sudo chmod 777 /media/D"
ok i'll try it, thanks alot.
hardware changes such as undocking before unmounting will prevent remouting until reboot
is the command permanent or not (sudo chmod 777 /media/D)?
yes it will stay until the drive in question is reformatted or renamed
sory, i'm in internet cafe so I can't practice it, so I have to be sure about the way out
